title: ‘It’s going to be a life skill’: educators discuss the impact of AI on university education
description: Artificial intelligence is changing how students learn and the world they’ll graduate into. Experts reveal how applicants can get ahead
content:
OpenAI CEO Sam Altman recently told a US podcast that if he was graduating today, “I would feel like the luckiest kid in all of history.”

description: Artificial intelligence appears to be constantly in the news these days. Will AI-enabled robots take our jobs? Will they become smarter than us and wipe out humanity?

title: Bangladesh vs Sri Lanka, Asia Cup 2025: Head-to-head analysis, AI prediction and more
description: Ahead of the match, Artificial Intelligence (AI) bots, ChatGPT and Grok AI were asked to predict the winner of the 5th match of the Asia Cup 2025. Based on the analysis of their past encounters, GPT and Grok gave out the following prediction for the upcoming BAN vs SL fixture.
content: A new chapter is set to unfold in a rivalry that has grown increasingly fiery in recent years as Bangladesh and Sri Lanka face off at the Zayed Cricket Stadium in Abu Dhabi. The stakes for the game are set at an all-time high for both sides, as two p... [2347 chars]

title: 67% of engineers say AI is changing their jobs, 85% see upskilling as way forward
description: A latest survey by Great Learning has found that 67% of Indian engineers feel their roles are being reshaped by artificial intelligence. The survey has shown 85% plan to upskill in FY26, favouring short, job-focused programmes.
content: Ahead of Engineers’ Day, Great Learning has released its latest survey showing a striking reality: 67% of Indian engineers believe their roles are already being reshaped by Artificial Intelligence. The findings point to a profession at the centre of ... [3018 chars]

title: Delhi HC Protects Abhishek Bachchan's Personality Rights, Bars Illegal Use Of His Name
description: The Delhi HC said it was clear that the attributes of Abhishek Bachchan's persona, including his name, images and signature, are being misused by the defendant websites and platforms without authorisation from him, by employing technological tools such as artificial intelligence
content:
The Delhi High Court has protected the personality rights of Bollywood actor Abhishek Bachchan by restraining several websites and online platforms from illegally using his name or images for commercial gain without his consent.

title: How to talk to your teen about AI : NPR
description: Many teens are using artificial intelligence chatbots like ChatGPT for everything from homework to relationship advice. Experts say parents must lead the way in helping them understand the technology.
content:
Nicholas Munkbhatter started using ChatGPT shortly after the artificial intelligence chatbot was released in late 2022. He was 14 at the time, and he says, "I would use it for almost everything, like math problems."
